#: ../src/view/comps/BuildSetting.mxml:54
msgid "Reset the frame size"  ****
msgstr "重设帧大小"

#: ../src/view/comps/BuildSetting.mxml:55
msgid ""
"If selected, reset the trimed frame to the original size. The trimed frame size in the metada will be the same as the original size(我认为这句可以不要啊，和之前那句是不是一个意思啊？）.
 If not selected, the trimed frame will be only used in the saved Sprite sheet.The original frame size and trimed frame size will be both saved in the metada.
***
msgstr ""
"选中后，将修剪空白后的大小重置为原始帧大小。元数据中修剪帧大小与原始帧大小相"
"同。\n"
"若不选，则仅在保存的Sheet图像中使用修剪后的大小，在metadata中记录原始的帧大小"
"和修剪的帧大小的数据。"

#: ../src/view/comps/FramesAndLabels.mxml:49

msgstr "原始"

#: ../src/view/comps/FramesAndLabels.mxml:50
msgid ""
"Display the width and height of the trimmed frame. It will be used in the actual process. To reduce the file size, we could trime the blank. If the file is not trimed, the original size will be the same as the trimed size.***
msgstr ""
"显示修剪空白前的帧的宽高，在实际的程序中会使用这个宽高。修剪空白是为了减小文"
"件尺寸。如果文件没有进行过修剪，则原始Rect的w、h与修剪的相等。"

#: ../src/view/comps/FramesAndLabels.mxml:56
msgid "All available frames:"
msgstr "所有可用帧："

#: ../src/view/comps/FramesAndLabels.mxml:56
msgid "No available frame."***
msgstr "没有可用帧。"

#: ../src/view/comps/FramesAndLabels.mxml:60
msgid "Add the Sprite Sheet"***
msgstr "增加Sprite Sheet"

#: ../src/view/comps/FramesAndLabels.mxml:61
msgid ""
"Add one or more Sprite Sheet to the end of the current Sprite Sheet. The "
"rules are as follows:\n"
"1. All frames will be added to the end of current Sprite Sheet;\n"
"2. If the label has already existed, it won't be imported.  But all frames in the label will be imported;\n"
"3. If the name has already existed, it won't be imported;\n"
"4. If the original Sprite Sheet contains the frame name, all imported frames without names will be automatically named."   ******
msgstr ""
"添加一个或多个SpriteSheet到当前Sheet的末尾。规则如下：\n"
"1.所有帧会增加到当前Sheet的末尾；\n"
"2.若label重名，则被导入Sheet中的label不导入，但依然会导入该lable的所有帧；\n"
"3.若name重名，则被导入的Sheet中该name对应的重名帧不会被导入；\n"
"4.若原始Sheet中包含name，但被导入Sheet中不含name，则会自动为被导入的Sheet中的"
"所有帧命名。"

msgstr "增加图像帧"

#: ../src/view/comps/FramesAndLabels.mxml:65
msgid ""
"Add multiple image files. Each frame will be added to the end of the current Sprite "
"Sheet."  ***
msgstr "添加多个图像文件。每个图像作为一帧增加到当前Sprite Sheet的末尾。"
